attributes.action: Prevent lefties starting petitions because they can't accept democratic votes.
attributes.background: Those wishing to ban Trump from visiting Britain need to understand that democracy (a construct Britain enhanced from the Greeks) has alowed a man presidency of America, wheather you agree or do not.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition calling for a specific change to the rules for petitions. You can find out about the rules here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/help
